Data

The recommended method to access PolarCAP data is by using the associated R package. For non-R users or those who prefer to have the raw data, a variety of data formats are available for download below.

CSV file (382 KB)

R object (107 KB)

Stata dataset (547 KB)

SPSS data file (349 KB)
